t: Amazon.com: Ergotron – LX Monitor Arm, Single Monitor Desk Mount – fits Flat Curved Ultrawide Computer Monitors up to 34 Inches, 7 to 25 lbs, VESA 75x75mm or 100x100mm – Polished Aluminum : Electronics
s: We are a movement company. It’s who we’ve been since Harry Sweere founded Ergotron in 1982 and earned patents on some of the first ergonomic desk stands. His legacy of innovation guides how we help our customers address the challenges of today and carries on in our core values.

t: Monitor Mounts, Computer Carts, Sit to Stand Desks | Ergotron
s: Ergotron uses human-centered design to build kinetic workspaces. Our products promote wellness and productivity by moving technology to where you need it most.

t: Heavy Duty Monitor Arm | Ergotron HX Desk Mounted Monitor Stand

t: Does anyone know what happened to the Amazon Basics ...

Amazon.com: Ergotron – HX Premium Heavy Duty Monitor Arm, Single Monitor VESA Desk Mount – for Flat or Slight Curved Ultrawide Monitors Up to 49 inches, 20 to 42 lbs – Standard Pivot, Polished Aluminum : Electronics
s: This is undoubtedly one of the best monitor arms on the market. While it is on the pricier side, its exceptional build quality and heavy-duty design make it worth every penny. If you own a 49-inch monitor, I highly recommend choosing an Ergotron monitor arm over any other brand.

t: Amazon Basics Ergotron-type Monitor Mount Rocks!
s: The black is a smooth, matte finish with a nice looking "Amazon Basics" logo. Absolutely love it! (Admittedly it's only been a day). The design is suspiciously similar to the Ergotron LX including the mounting base, so I wouldn't be surprised if this is the Amazon Basics brand of the same product.
